typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
